channel.title: Pages on Pheara’s Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Pheara’s Ramblings

item.title: About
item.description: This is my personal blog, mostly consisting of work done as part of studying the “Media and Human Centered Computing” curriculum at the TU Wien. As such it is about prototypes/topics in human computer interaction, sociology of technology and game design. This blog has been built using Hugo (Apache 2 licensed) and the theme Pixyll (MIT licensed). All original content is CC-BY. Non-original content should be labelled as such, including license information.
